data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Bharatpur, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bharatpur, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Bharatpur, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Bharatpur, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Bharatpur, Rajasthan, India the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Bairwa people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, make bold the prophets in Bharatpur, Rajasthan, India so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Bharatpur, Rajasthan, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 28,034 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.
